description: Strengthening the disaster risk reduction and recovery (DRR) system in Serbia

subproject.description:
Project Title: Strengthening the disaster risk reduction and recovery (DRR) system in Serbia


Output 1 
Institutional and legal framework for disaster risk reduction strengthened

Output 2
New One UN – Joint Programme developed and UNCT DRR capacity strengthened.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Strengt.DRR capacity in Serbia

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description:
Project Title: Strengthening the disaster risk reduction and recovery (DRR) system in Serbia


Output 1 
Institutional and legal framework for disaster risk reduction strengthened

Output 2
New One UN – Joint Programme developed and UNCT DRR capacity strengthened.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Strengt.DRR capacity in Serbia

subproject.description:
Output 1: Coordination
Planned activities:
1.1. Coordinate the UNCT Early Recovery efforts
- Provide high level advice
- Provide inputs for SitReps

Output 2: Recovery Planning and Framework Development
Planned activities:
2.1.Support Recovery Programming efforts:
- Elaboration of local recovery strategies
2.2. Consolidate needs assessments
2.3. Preparation of a recovery framework.
2.4. Conduct Risk Assessments
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Respon. to Kraljevo earthquake

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
